title: Levi Strauss Signature Gold Women's Totally Shaping Pull-on Skinny Jeans (Available in Plus Size)
description: Same great jeans, brand new name! Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. is now Levi Strauss Signature Gold
Super stretch lasts from day to night; snug fit doesn't lose shape
Mid-rise pull-on waistband with tummy-slimming panel

Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. Women’s Totally Shaping Pull-On Skinny Jeans add easy style to your wardrobe. They have a flattering, skinny fit from the pull-on waistband down to the hem, and the soft, stretchy fabric keeps you comfortable as they keep their shape. The built-in tummy panel smooths your middle without feeling tight. Wear this pair with a favorite top and any shoes you like. You've got options.
